name: io.github.odds7/fia-signals-mcp
description: AI-native crypto market intelligence MCP server. Real-time regime detection (HMM-based), funding rates, liquidation zones, Fear & Greed index, technical signals, prices across 5 exchanges, and comprehensive market briefs. Built for AI agents that trade or analyse crypto markets.

tools.name: get_market_regime
tools.description: BTC volatility regime classification (trending/ranging/volatile/breakout) with RSI, ADX, EMA trend, Bollinger width, and confidence level

tools.name: get_fear_greed
tools.description: Crypto Fear & Greed Index with classification and historical comparison

tools.name: get_funding_rates
tools.description: Top perpetual funding rates across Bybit with annualised yield calculations

tools.name: get_technical_signals
tools.description: Multi-indicator technical analysis for any symbol: EMA cross, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, ADX

tools.name: get_prices
tools.description: Real-time crypto prices from Binance with 24h change percentage and volume

tools.name: get_liquidations
tools.description: Recent liquidation events and cluster analysis from Bybit

tools.name: get_market_dominance
tools.description: BTC and ETH market dominance percentages with total market cap

tools.name: get_full_market_brief
tools.description: Complete market intelligence brief combining regime, F&G, funding, technicals, prices, liquidations, and dominance in one call
